docs.text: zend-mvc-plugin-identity Provides a zend-mvc plugin (for versions 3.0 and up) that allows retrieving the current identity as provided by zend-authentication . File issues at https://github.com/zendframework/zend-mvc-plugin-identity/issues Documentation is at https://docs.zendframework.com/zend-mvc-plugin-identity/
docs.title: zend-mvc-plugin-identity
